story:
As seen on:     BRUSH MEDIC



                                        

 Did you know makeup has a dirty secret?  

It's BACTERIA, and your applying it to your face everyday! Every time you use your brushes, makeup, oil, dirt and bacteria get trapped in the bristles of your brushes and is shown in laboratory testing to multiply to staggering amounts quickly, leading to clogged pores and pesky breakouts, as well as serious skin health issues. We wash our body, face and hair daily, along with our clothes regularly, however most women only occasionally or never wash their makeup brushes. Ironic that one of the things we rely on to keep us looking our best, our makeup brushes, can actually be our worst enemy against breakouts and skin health.

Your brushes need to be properly cleaned 

to remove bacteria and buildup

Alcohol based quick dry cleaners only clean the bristle tips, plus they can damage both synthetic and natural hair bristles and loosen glue quickly. Experts highly suggest, the average woman should sterilize their brushes daily and deep clean with a water-based cleaner, at least once a week. Cosmetic stores, spas and makeup artists should sterilizer after each client and then properly deep clean brushes with a water-based cleaner once a day.

The reason this deep cleaning is very rarely done is due to the time it takes for brushes to dry and be able to use again. Some thick natural hair brushes can take 24 hours to air dry, leading to the possibility of mold growth. Improper drying position can cause moisture seepage and loosen bristles. 

Your makeup brushes are expensive, proper care of your brushes will extend their life tremendously.

                 

                  

THE BRUSH MEDIC™ PRO

Patent pending design safely dries makeup brushes up to 10x quicker than conventional air drying. Germicidal Deep UV-C Sterilizing Technology kills most viruses, germs, microorganisms and bacteria to 99.9% effectively free in less than 2 minutes. Perfect for the everyday woman for less breakouts and worries of skin health, all while extending the life of your expensive brushes. The Brush Medic Pro is a must for the professional makeup artist, to assure clients that health and safety is their priority, not to mention speeding up valuable time and eliminating need to carry so many extra clean brushes. Compact size is great for home, travel or business. 

  • Safely dries and UV sterilizes 6 large or up to 24 small brushes (or 1 Kabuki)
  • Includes a Kabuki brush holder
  • Suspends brushes properly bristles down to prevent moisture seepage
  • Dehumidifying air circulation chamber dries even the thickest natural hair brushes in usually 1 hour or less after deep wet-cleaning (normally 10+ hrs conventional drying)
  • Gentle air flow does not disfigure bristles
  • Timer-UV Sterilizing and drying 60 minutes
  • Door safety feature turns off when open
  • Compact: 7"w-11"d-10"h
  • 110v and 12v cords included
  • UV Wavelength: UV-C (253.7nm) kills 99.9% effective most viruses, germs and bacteria 
  • Commercial, travel or home use
  • Patent pending
  • See Perks on right side of page for options and expected delivery dates
  • (retail price will be $299)
  • 1 year limited warranty

All perk prices include U.S. shipping except reseller perks



ALSO AVAILABLE

                        THE BRUSH MEDIC™ SALON

Patent pending design safely dries makeup brushes up to 10x quicker than conventional air drying. Germicidal Deep UV-C Sterilizing Technology kills most viruses, germs, microorganisms and bacteria to 99.9% free in less than 5 minutes from makeup brushes and makeup by placing open containers, palettes on rack. The Salon model is designed for commercial use to assure customers that their health and safety is the utmost priority of the company all while speeding up employees valuable time and eliminating excessive amount of brushes needed.

  • Safely dries and UV sterilizes up to 70 small brushes or 4 large, 12 medium and 18 small brushes at one time
  • UV Sterilizes makeup by placing open makeup palette or container face up on rack
  • 2 Modes: 1-UV Sterilizing plus drying 30 minutes and 1-UV Sterilize only mode
  • Includes 2 makeup holding racks, 1 multi-brush support rack and an extra large handle Kabuki brush holder
  • Suspends brushes properly bristles down to prevent moisture seepage
  • Dehumidifying air circulation chamber dries even the thickest natural hair brushes in usually 1 hour or less after deep wet cleaning (normally 10+ hrs conventional drying)
  • Gentle air flow does not blow heat on brushes, disfigure bristles or damage makeup
  • Door safety feature turns off when open
  • Compact: 11.5"w -11.5"d -13.5"h
  • 110v  CE Certified
  • UV-C Wavelength: (254nm) kills 99.9% effective most viruses, germs and bacteria 
  • Commercial use
  • Patent pending
  • Retail price $399*  (Special Pre-Order Pricing Starts At $299*)
  • 1 year warranty

 

Additional Perks Available:

                                     



       

                                          

THE BRUSH MEDIC™ MINI

Patent pending design will dry your makeup brushes up to 3x quicker than conventional drying by correctly suspending in our air flow chamber. Sterilizes quickly using UV-C Germicidal Technology to kill viruses, germs, microorganisms and bacteria to 99.9% free in less than 2 minutes. Great for personal and travel use, only 3" wide.
  • Dries and UV sterilizes 4 medium or up to 10 small brushes (or 1 Kabuki)
  • Includes a Kabuki brush holder
  • Mini size fits anywhere on counter: 3"w-3"d-8"h
  • Suspends brushes to eliminate damage from water seepage.
  • Gentle air movement does not distort or damage bristles
  • Door safety feature turns off when open
  • 110v (12v plug available)
  • UV Wavelength: UV-C (253.7nm) kills 99.9% effective most viruses, germs and bacteria
  • Commercial or home use
  • Patent pending design
  • See Perks on right side of page for options and expected delivery dates
  • (retail price will be $89)  
  • 1 year limited warranty

All perk prices include U.S. shipping except reseller perks



                                                  

    THE BRUSH MEDIC™ WALL DRYING RACK

    Intelligently designed with the professional and personal user in mind to properly hang dry or just organize your brushes out of the way and off your counter top.

    • Mounts easily and securely to wall in minutes
    • Holds 1 large handle Kabuki, 8 large and 6 to 12 medium/small brushes at one time or up to 36+ small brushes
    • 12"w 4"d 2.5"h
    • Suspends brushes properly to eliminate moisture seepage into glue
    • Great for organizing and storing brushes
    • Commercial or home use
    • Available White or Black
    • Patent pending
    • Available delivery at end of campaign
    • See Perks on right side of page for options and expected delivery dates
    • (retail price will be $39)
    • 1 year limited warranty

    All perk prices include U.S. shipping except reseller perks


       

                                

    THE BRUSH MEDIC™ CLEANING KIT

    The most complete cleaning kit available for your makeup brushes. Specially formulated to easily clean and remove stubborn makeup, residue and oil for best results with your Brush Medic Makeup Brush Dryer.

    Kit includes:

    • Brush Medic Quick Clean Wipes, Non-Alcohol (42 count) quickly cleans without worry of damage that alcohol cleaners can cause, brushes usually dry in 2 minutes inside Brush Medic Pro machine for in-between deep cleans
    • Brush Medic Deep Cleaner and Conditioner (6oz highly concentrated formula dilutes with water for 100's of brush cleanings)
    • Brush Medic Blotting Towel
    • Brush cleaning mitt for deeper and quicker cleaning while protecting hand
    • Brush Medic set or (9) assorted Brush Shapers™ to hold bristle shape as drying
    • Commercial and home use
    • Available delivery at end of campaign
    • See Perks on right side of page for options and expected delivery date
    • (retail price will be $69)

    All perk prices include U.S. shipping except reseller perks


    Be quick to enjoy best pricing!!

    All perk prices are well below the retail prices that will go in effect after campaign ends. Early Bird Perks are the best deals but have limited quantities, so don't hesitate or they'll be gone. Package Perks are also great for saving $ and include a wall rack and cleaning kit.

    Why am I pre-ordering through Indiegogo?

    Pre-ordering through Indiegogo guarantees your the first to own a Brush Medic and at a deep discounted price off retail pricing. While we are already funding our first production run starting in December, your help with the contributions received during this campaign will help fund our 2nd production run so we can deliver the 2nd production run as early as possible so we don't have a  long waiting period between delivery of products. We believe this is a win win for all. 

    Why did BRUSH MEDIC™ choose to crowdfund?

    We have several fully functional prototypes of both Brush Medic Pro and Mini models in use by professional makeup artists locally and traveling nationally. We have aligned ourselves with a manufacturing company to produce units and will soon be ready for production as soon as CE, RoHS and UL listing certifications are complete.

    We were able to speed up our production process time and keep pricing down by working with a manufacture with existing injection molds of products in other markets and innovatively modifying them to add our hardware and proprietary technology, ultimately producing our exclusive patent pending BRUSH MEDIC Makeup Brush Drying and UV Sterilizing Machines. This is also allowing us to start a low production run before this campaign ends for a quicker delivery of our first Brush Medic machines. 200 of each of our Brush Medic Pro and Mini models will be run with an expected April 2015 delivery. These are divided between our 6 options of "EARLY BIRD" perks, so act quickly or they will be gone! Our 2nd run of production will be ordered according to pre-orders here on Indiegogo with delivery estimated for June 2015. (see all perks for expected delivery dates of products)

    Though we have big ambitions, we are a small start-up company and only have the capacity to finance this modest first production run. This is where you come in.  You can help us to increase the amount of product we can order from the factory as well as accelerate the speed with which we can get it into the hands of our customers. Your support will make this possible and will be a vital spark in growing a company obsessed with fixing this dirty secret of bacteria within the cosmetic industry.

    This campaign's goal is set at raising a modest $25,000, this is due to being pretty far ahead in the production process. However, we fully expect to exceed that easily but if we do not reach our goal, rest assured we are still moving forward with production of all products and will deliver to the best of our ability as described.

    As for our other available perks, we are already producing our wall racks and cleaning kits and will ship immediately at campaigns end, unless you selected a perk that is a "package", then it will ship along with your dryer/sterilizer.


    BRUSH MEDIC TIMELINE

    JAN 2013 - FEB 2014: Product Development
    SEPT 2013 - AUG 2014: Product Prototyping and Testing
    AUG 2014 - NOV 2014: Manufacture Aligning
    NOV 14th 2014 - JAN 1ST 2015: Indiegogo Campaign
    DEC 2014: Manufacturing Begins 1st Run Brush Medic Pro and Mini
    JAN 2015: Wall Rack and Cleaning Kit Perks Ship
    FEB 2015: Manufacturing Begins 2nd Run Brush Medic Pro and Mini
    APRIL 2015: 1st Run Brush Medic Pro and Mini Perks Ship
    JUNE 2015: 2nd Run Brush Medic Pro, Mini and Reseller Perks Ship
    SEPT 2015: Available at Select Retailers Worldwide

    Do we ship Internationally?

     Yes, for additional $50 we ship any Perk (or will combine 2 Perks total together) internationally to the EU (all 28 countries), Canada, Norway, Switzerland, Australia, New Zealand, China, Japan, Korea, Singapore, Hong Kong, Vietnam, Indonesia, Thailand, Brazil, Argentina, Chile, Peru & Mexico.  Just add $50 in "Additional Gift" option during purchase or use the "Forgot International Shipping?" Perk.


      Risks & Challenges

      Brush Medic LLC has developed and built all the products shown on this campaign and are not computer generated images (unlike many other companies using crowdfunding), of a product that is just an idea. Our prototypes have been fully tested for performance and safety, we have several that are currently being used daily by individuals and professionals with nothing but great praise and feedback. Our end product may differ only slightly than what is shown but only has an improvement. For example, our end product Brush Medic Pro, will have a digital timer that is not on our prototypes. Again, we are aligned with a manufacturing company and ready to go into production and believe we can deliver products within our estimated delivery dates shown on each perk.

      Risks to you minimized

      We are using Paypal and Apple Pay for credit card processing, so if anything happens and we do not deliver, they will always protect you!

      Carla Jackson, CEO and founder of Brush Medic LLC

Patent pending design safely dries makeup brushes up to 10x quicker than conventional air drying. Germicidal Deep UV-C Sterilizing Technology kills most viruses, germs, microorganisms and bacteria to 99.9% free in less than 5 minutes from makeup brushes and makeup by placing open containers, palettes on rack. The Salon model is designed for commercial use to assure customers that their health and safety is the utmost priority of the company all while speeding up employees valuable time and eliminating excessive amount of brushes needed.

Safely dries and UV sterilizes up to 70 small brushes or 4 large, 12 medium and 18 small brushes at one time
UV Sterilizes makeup by placing open makeup palette or container face up on rack
2 Modes: 1-UV Sterilizing plus drying 30 minutes and 1-UV Sterilize only mode
Includes 2 makeup holding racks, 1 multi-brush support rack and an extra large handle Kabuki brush holder
Suspends brushes properly bristles down to prevent moisture seepage
Dehumidifying air circulation chamber dries even the thickest natural hair brushes in usually 1 hour or less after deep wet cleaning (normally 10+ hrs conventional drying)
Gentle air flow does not blow heat on brushes, disfigure bristles or damage makeup
Door safety feature turns off when open
Compact: 11.5"w -11.5"d -13.5"h
110v  CE Certified
UV-C Wavelength: (254nm) kills 99.9% effective most viruses, germs and bacteria 
Commercial use
Patent pending
Retail price $399*  (Special Pre-Order Pricing Starts At $299*)
1 year warranty



 Additional Perks Available:                                      





       
                                          

THE BRUSH MEDIC™ MINI
Patent pending design will dry your makeup brushes up to 3x quicker than conventional drying by correctly suspending in our air flow chamber. Sterilizes quickly using UV-C Germicidal Technology to kill viruses, germs, microorganisms and bacteria to 99.9% free in less than 2 minutes. Great for personal and travel use, only 3" wide.


Dries and UV sterilizes 4 medium or up to 10 small brushes (or 1 Kabuki)
Includes a Kabuki brush holder
Mini size fits anywhere on counter: 3"w-3"d-8"h
Suspends brushes to eliminate damage from water seepage.
Gentle air movement does not distort or damage bristles
Door safety feature turns off when open
110v (12v plug available)
UV Wavelength: UV-C (253.7nm) kills 99.9% effective most viruses, germs and bacteria
Commercial or home use

Patent pending design
See Perks on right side of page for options and expected delivery dates
(retail price will be $89)  
1 year limited warranty


All perk prices include U.S. shipping except reseller perks








                                              

THE BRUSH MEDIC™ WALL DRYING RACK
Intelligently designed with the professional and personal user in mind to properly hang dry or just organize your brushes out of the way and off your counter top.

Mounts easily and securely to wall in minutes
Holds 1 large handle Kabuki, 8 large and 6 to 12 medium/small brushes at one time or up to 36+ small brushes
12"w 4"d 2.5"h
Suspends brushes properly to eliminate moisture seepage into glue
Great for organizing and storing brushes
Commercial or home use
Available White or Black
Patent pending
Available delivery at end of campaign
See Perks on right side of page for options and expected delivery dates
(retail price will be $39)
1 year limited warranty



All perk prices include U.S. shipping except reseller perks
   
                            

THE BRUSH MEDIC™ CLEANING KIT


The most complete cleaning kit available for your makeup brushes. Specially formulated to easily clean and remove stubborn makeup, residue and oil for best results with your Brush Medic Makeup Brush Dryer.
Kit includes:

Brush Medic Quick Clean Wipes, Non-Alcohol (42 count) quickly cleans without worry of damage that alcohol cleaners can cause, brushes usually dry in 2 minutes inside Brush Medic Pro machine for in-between deep cleans
Brush Medic Deep Cleaner and Conditioner (6oz highly concentrated formula dilutes with water for 100's of brush cleanings)
Brush Medic Blotting Towel
Brush cleaning mitt for deeper and quicker cleaning while protecting hand
Brush Medic set or (9) assorted Brush Shapers™ to hold bristle shape as drying
Commercial and home use
Available delivery at end of campaign
See Perks on right side of page for options and expected delivery date
(retail price will be $69)




All perk prices include U.S. shipping except reseller perks



Be quick to enjoy best pricing!!
All perk prices are well below the retail prices that will go in effect after campaign ends. Early Bird Perks are the best deals but have limited quantities, so don't hesitate or they'll be gone. Package Perks are also great for saving $ and include a wall rack and cleaning kit.
Why am I pre-ordering through Indiegogo?
Pre-ordering through Indiegogo guarantees your the first to own a Brush Medic and at a deep discounted price off retail pricing. While we are already funding our first production run starting in December, your help with the contributions received during this campaign will help fund our 2nd production run so we can deliver the 2nd production run as early as possible so we don't have a  long waiting period between delivery of products. We believe this is a win win for all. 

Why did BRUSH MEDIC™ choose to crowdfund?







We have several fully functional prototypes of both Brush Medic Pro and Mini models in use by professional makeup artists locally and traveling nationally. We have aligned ourselves with a manufacturing company to produce units and will soon be ready for production as soon as CE, RoHS and UL listing certifications are complete.
We were able to speed up our production process time and keep pricing down by working with a manufacture with existing injection molds of products in other markets and innovatively modifying them to add our hardware and proprietary technology, ultimately producing our exclusive patent pending BRUSH MEDIC Makeup Brush Drying and UV Sterilizing Machines. This is also allowing us to start a low production run before this campaign ends for a quicker delivery of our first Brush Medic machines. 200 of each of our Brush Medic Pro and Mini models will be run with an expected April 2015 delivery. These are divided between our 6 options of "EARLY BIRD" perks, so act quickly or they will be gone! Our 2nd run of production will be ordered according to pre-orders here on Indiegogo with delivery estimated for June 2015. (see all perks for expected delivery dates of products)
Though we have big ambitions, we are a small start-up company and only have the capacity to finance this modest first production run. This is where you come in.  You can help us to increase the amount of product we can order from the factory as well as accelerate the speed with which we can get it into the hands of our customers. Your support will make this possible and will be a vital spark in growing a company obsessed with fixing this dirty secret of bacteria within the cosmetic industry.
This campaign's goal is set at raising a modest $25,000, this is due to being pretty far ahead in the production process. However, we fully expect to exceed that easily but if we do not reach our goal, rest assured we are still moving forward with production of all products and will deliver to the best of our ability as described.
As for our other available perks, we are already producing our wall racks and cleaning kits and will ship immediately at campaigns end, unless you selected a perk that is a "package", then it will ship along with your dryer/sterilizer.





BRUSH MEDIC TIMELINE

JAN 2013 - FEB 2014: Product Development

SEPT 2013 - AUG 2014: Product Prototyping and Testing

AUG 2014 - NOV 2014: Manufacture Aligning

NOV 14th 2014 - JAN 1ST 2015: Indiegogo Campaign

DEC 2014: Manufacturing Begins 1st Run Brush Medic Pro and Mini

JAN 2015: Wall Rack and Cleaning Kit Perks Ship

FEB 2015: Manufacturing Begins 2nd Run Brush Medic Pro and Mini

APRIL 2015: 1st Run Brush Medic Pro and Mini Perks Ship

JUNE 2015: 2nd Run Brush Medic Pro, Mini and Reseller Perks Ship

SEPT 2015: Available at Select Retailers Worldwide


Do we ship Internationally?

 Yes, for additional $50 we ship any Perk (or will combine 2 Perks total together) internationally to the EU (all 28 countries), Canada, Norway, Switzerland, Australia, New Zealand, China, Japan, Korea, Singapore, Hong Kong, Vietnam, Indonesia, Thailand, Brazil, Argentina, Chile, Peru & Mexico.  Just add $50 in "Additional Gift" option during purchase or use the "Forgot International Shipping?" Perk.


  

  Risks & Challenges  
Brush Medic LLC has developed and built all the products shown on this campaign and are not computer generated images (unlike many other companies using crowdfunding), of a product that is just an idea. Our prototypes have been fully tested for performance and safety, we have several that are currently being used daily by individuals and professionals with nothing but great praise and feedback. Our end product may differ only slightly than what is shown but only has an improvement. For example, our end product Brush Medic Pro, will have a digital timer that is not on our prototypes. Again, we are aligned with a manufacturing company and ready to go into production and believe we can deliver products within our estimated delivery dates shown on each perk.
Risks to you minimized
We are using Paypal and Apple Pay for credit card processing, so if anything happens and we do not deliver, they will always protect you!



Carla Jackson, CEO and founder of Brush Medic LLC

story:
Abigail Gozlan Saxon needs IVF in order to guarantee her baby does not die of a severe genetic disease by five years of age.

The IVF will also guarantee the end of this genetic disease being transmitted within Abigail’s bloodline for all of her future offspring.

Abigail, 22, is recently married.  Like most married Orthodox Jewish couples Abigail and her husband Yehuda want to have the joy and privilege of bringing life into this world. 

There is only one obstacle:  Abigail was born with a genetic disease called Myotonic Dystrophy Type 1.  Over time, this genetic disease causes muscle degeneration of the entire body.  Abigail’s case is not that severe, but if Myotonic Dystrophy Type 1 is transmitted through the mother, there is a 65% chance of the child dying by the age of five (G-d forbid).  

“We want to build a family and my illness is preventing me from doing that.  All I want is to raise my own children to be happy and healthy.  I don’t want to have to worry about them not making it to age five.”

Abigail needs funds in order to pay for in-vitro fertilization (IVF).  By undergoing this procedure, she can break the chain of mutation and end this debilitating disease for not only her children, but for many future generations of the Jewish people.  

IVF costs range from $13,000- $23,000. 

When you donate you get the merit of helping to bring a healthy baby into this world.  You also help wipe out a life-destroying genetic disease that no child should have to suffer from.

Your donation will enable this young couple to prevent their child from contracting a heinous genetic disease and dying by the age of five.  Instead, because of you, they will G-d willing enjoy the wonderful and miraculous experience of parenting a healthy child.    

My name is Alexander (Avi) Davidson.  I was born with a blessed life and survived a tragic accident. I did not survive on my own, though. Faith, family, & friends helped me overcome my newfound challenges.  Because of my accident, I had the chance to see people help a person they love to such an extent that it has inspired me for as long as I live.   Now, I want to persuade you to help someone near and dear to my heart.  Abigail is a dear friend that I have known since I was in a crib.  She is like an older sister to me.  It is because of our lifelong friendship that I want to help her fulfill her dreams. 

    Even if you can't help financially, there are still ways you can!!!

    1. Spread this as far as you can.  Scream it on all of your social sites. Use anything! 

    Word of mouth, Facebook, Twitter,  etc.

    2. Pray that they have beautiful, healthy children.

    Thanks from the bottom of my heart.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Drew Cumpson and I'm a C-4 quadriplegic and ventilator dependent. In May 2011 The University of Guelph sent a small group of students to Peru. The purpose of this international excursion was to enrich the learning experiences of each student while providing aid to local communities in need. My heart, determination and loving nature made me the ideal candidate for this excursion. The 12-day journey was centered in the city of Lima, Peru. Our humanitarian efforts began in a small shanty village located in the mountains of Lima. We designed, commissioned and constructed a staircase to assist in the mobility of the people who lived in this community. From a health and wellness standpoint we initiated dental hygiene, immunization and lice programs centered on assisting the children specifically. Along with the planned humanitarian efforts I made an external connection with the children, the community, and the culture. 

On May 10, 2011 the waves were big, the tide was high and the undertow was strong. Being a lifeguard for the better part of 4 years I was fully certified and trained in NLS, CPR and First Aid. I understood well the dangers of the ocean, but I could not have foreseen what would have happened next. A massive wave came crashing down on my head when I was least expecting it, taking me under with extreme force. The sheer power of the wave pushed me down at a crushing speed where my head made direct contact with the ocean floor. It was at this very moment I understood something was wrong with my neck. Barely conscious I could not act on any of my lifeguarding knowledge. As my friends worryingly approached my limp body to perform a spinal roll over I mouthed “support my neck.” These were my last words before falling unconscious.

I have spent the last three years in the hospital due to the fact that I need 24 seven nursing care and the government will only provide me with roughly 21 hours a week in care. I have a fully accessible house to move home to that was built in move-in ready for May of 2013. I am ready to move out of the hospital and into the house but unfortunately do not have enough care needs to support that. That is why I am reaching out to you.

I do not want to live in the hospital anymore! 


What We Need & What You Get

There is a diaphragmatic pacemaker now available in Canada. With the use of a diaphragmatic pacemaker, I would be able to be off the mechanical ventilator for prolonged periods of the day with even some patients able to be off the ventilator permanently. How the diaphragm stimulator works is through laparoscopic procedure which involves a tube into the abdomen, electrode pacemakers are placed on the undersurface of the diaphragm and connected to a stimulator box which is on the patient externally. Through this stimulator box, the diaphragm receives regular electrical signals to contract and pulls air into the lungs. 

Unfortunately, the surgical procedure would be covered in hospital but the device is not. By way of this letter, we are requesting that you consider assisting with funding for this device which would be an approximate cost of $35,000. I thank you for considering this. Every dollar raised will be going towards the device as this surgery is going to happen, so every dollar counts.


The Impact

NeuRx DPS is implanted through minimally invasive laparoscopic surgery and provides electrical stimulation of the muscles of the diaphragm. To be eligible, a patient’s diaphragm must show its ability to respond to stimulation. During the procedure, a surgeon creates small holes in the abdomen and inserts a laparoscope so the diaphragm muscle can be seen. The surgeon then places small electrodes in the diaphragm. "Although results may vary, some patients are provided the greatest freedom and are ventilator free for up to 24 hours a day." Electrodes are then attached to a small external battery powered pulse generator, which stimulates the diaphragm, causing a contraction of muscle. This allows air to fill the upper and lower parts of the lungs rather than forcing air in with a mechanical ventilator. The stimulation is then used to condition the diaphragm, enabling the patient to breathe longer without the need of ventilator. The device is controlled through a four-channel, battery-powered external pulse generator and eliminates the need for a source of electricity and concern for power outages. Diaphragm dysfunction can result in abnormal or absent respiration in patient populations of high-level SCI and other injuries or diseases affecting the neuromuscular respiratory pathways. In the US clinical trial, more than 50% of the eligible participants were able to completely eliminate their need for mechanical ventilation. This new approval enables SCI patients throughout Canada to access this technology that was only previously available to clinical trial participants or through the Medical Devices Special Access Program.


Benefits

The following are a list of benefits that patients on ventilators will have after receiving the pacer; greatly reduced or eliminated ventilator dependence, the ability to taste and smell again, and minimized risk of pneumonia. Health Canada approved the device not just for one individual patient, but for all patients across Canada with SCI who are ventilator-dependent and lack voluntary control of their diaphragms.


Other Ways You Can Help

Donations are a great way for you to help out with this campaign but on top of that it would be amazing if you'd be able to share this campaign with your friends and family in order for me to reach my goal I will need as much help as possible. The Indiegogo the website has this unique share tool that allows for you to share this campaign with your friends, family and coworkers, I could use all the help in the world to make this surgery happen and improve my quality of life.

story:
Short Summary

I am Colin Mackie and I have been immersed in sales and marketing all of my short life (60+). For the last few years I have dedicated myself to developing a product for people who smoke that creates less harm to themselves, other people and the environment. 

We have spent four years developing such a product and invested over $1,400,000 to get it 'Market Ready'  We are now at this point and we need funding to get our message out to those who need us and our amazing product - an estimated 17,500,000 in the US alone.

Our patented filter has been developed in conjunction with one of the worlds leading filter manufacturers. These filters are huge, effective and unique. This German company has guaranteed that they can supply us with 1,000,000 of these filters each and every day.  This is our world target.

Imagine if we could reach 5% of these 137,500,000 people in the USA (875,000) who like and had purchased our product? What would this mean? 
Over three quarters a million people in the USA would be:
Smoking in a safer way by using our patented filter system
Not wasting any of their valuable medical marijuana
875,000 + discarded butts each day and not damaging the environment and killing wildlife (over 159,687,500, less butts per year - 2 butts a day x 365 days)
No paper taste and, more importantly, no paper chemicals
Less secondhand smoke to upset non smokers
Using a very simple, convenient, smooth and cool device with lots of positives for all.

Why we need funding:

With so much money already invested in R & D, and the very high costs we have incurred in patenting and maintaining the patents, we have used up an estimated $1.4 mil of private funds. Now that the market has opened for marijuana use up and we can get now get our product advertised and promoted, we need money to educate people to the dangers of smoking without some form of dedicated filter and to the numerous benefits of our superb pipes.

Publicity is more valuable than advertising. But publicity, done properly, requires funding. We need to employ a professional person in the USA to contact all forms of media to get the message out of a better way to smoke medical marijuana. We budget a six monthly cost of this to be $15,000.

We are concentrating on the sates of Washington and Colorado for advertising.We will utilize the best hard-copy and on-line magazines that are dedicated to this burgeoning market. Graphic art work, promotions and placement. We have set a budget of $30,000.

Travel, accommodation, space, design, material, prizes, etc., to and setting up at expos, shows and other relevant events  x 2 = $15,000.

If you would like to help us get our message out there, we would like to offer you the following:

We have 'Perks' at $25.00, $35,00, $60.00 and $30,000.  Please see 'Perks'. 

Should we not reach our goal all funds received will be used for advertising and promotion. We will concentrate on one State at a time beginning with Colorado and then Washington at a later date.  California is also a major potential market for us.

If we exceed our goal, 50% of the excess will be put into R & D to refine and improve our filters. One area we are investigating is with a filter that is being produced in China and made from bamboo - organic and totally biodegradable

The Impact

  • If you type into Google the two words, "Marijuana Filters" you will see that this combination of words has attracted 3,600,000 hits. One would assume, therefore, that there are in excess of 3,000,000 people who are concerned about smoking marijuana without some form of filter.
  • If you scroll through the links you will find may contradictory statement about the potential risks of smoking marijuana without some filter system. One New Zealand report suggested that smoking one unfiltered joint was the equivalent of smoking 20 filtered cigarettes.
  • Another scientific report states that smoking a water bong actually is counter-productive in removing particulate matter.  THC is water soluble and some is lost with each puff. Tar is not water soluble so it is not extracted. This means that you have to make many more puffs to get a result from the THC, but you have had to take more inhalations of tar to get the desired result.
  • Regardless of what people smoke, tobacco, cannabis or lettuce leaves, particulate matter being ingested into vital organs should ring health alarm bells. We might not like wearing seat belts, but we are fully aware of the benefits.

Other Ways You Can Help

You may be unable to contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • You, like me, might not smoke. Like me you may be concerned about friends and family who do. Like me, you may not like to see the harm that can befall these people and you feel that you NEED to do something to help.  Direct them to our pipes .
  • Like me, you may be worried about the harm caused by discarded butts to birds, fish and other wildlife - direct your smoking friends to Savorette
  • You may also dislike the thought of yourself, or others inhaling side stream smoke (Second hand smoke) - encourage your associates to visit Savorette
  • Spread the word that there is a better way to smoke, a safer way to smoke and environmentally more aware way to smoke. 

STOP PRESS: We have some pipes that we have decided not to sell.  They are exactly the same as our current models, but were a lightweight model we felt were not quite good enough for general release. We will give these free to persons who are seriously disadvantaged.  A letter to tell us why you need one and what you can do to help us get our product into the market and we will seriously consider your request.

And please remember to use the Indiegogo share tools.

What would this mean?  Over three quarters a million people in the USA would be:Smoking in a safer way by using our patented filter systemNot wasting any of their valuable medical marijuana875,000 + discarded butts each day and not damaging the environment and killing wildlife (over 159,687,500, less butts per year - 2 butts a day x 365 days)No paper taste and, more importantly, no paper chemicalsLess secondhand smoke to upset non smokersUsing a very simple, convenient, smooth and cool device with lots of positives for all.Why we need funding:With so much money already invested in R & D, and the very high costs we have incurred in patenting and maintaining the patents, we have used up an estimated $1.4 mil of private funds. Now that the market has opened for marijuana use up and we can get now get our product advertised and promoted, we need money to educate people to the dangers of smoking without some form of dedicated filter and to the numerous benefits of our superb pipes.Publicity is more valuable than advertising. But publicity, done properly, requires funding. We need to employ a professional person in the USA to contact all forms of media to get the message out of a better way to smoke medical marijuana. We budget a six monthly cost of this to be $15,000. We are concentrating on the sates of Washington and Colorado for advertising.We will utilize the best hard-copy and on-line magazines that are dedicated to this burgeoning market. Graphic art work, promotions and placement. We have set a budget of $30,000.Travel, accommodation, space, design, material, prizes, etc., to and setting up at expos, shows and other relevant events  x 2 = $15,000. If you would like to help us get our message out there, we would like to offer you the following:We have 'Perks' at $25.00, $35,00, $60.00 and $30,000.  Please see 'Perks'.  Should we not reach our goal all funds received will be used for advertising and promotion. We will concentrate on one State at a time beginning with Colorado and then Washington at a later date.  California is also a major potential market for us.If we exceed our goal, 50% of the excess will be put into R & D to refine and improve our filters. One area we are investigating is with a filter that is being produced in China and made from bamboo - organic and totally biodegradableThe Impact
If you type into Google the two words, "Marijuana Filters" you will see that this combination of words has attracted 3,600,000 hits. One would assume, therefore, that there are in excess of 3,000,000 people who are concerned about smoking marijuana without some form of filter.
If you scroll through the links you will find may contradictory statement about the potential risks of smoking marijuana without some filter system. One New Zealand report suggested that smoking one unfiltered joint was the equivalent of smoking 20 filtered cigarettes.

Another scientific report states that smoking a water bong actually is counter-productive in removing particulate matter.  THC is water soluble and some is lost with each puff. Tar is not water soluble so it is not extracted. This means that you have to make many more puffs to get a result from the THC, but you have had to take more inhalations of tar to get the desired result.

Regardless of what people smoke, tobacco, cannabis or lettuce leaves, particulate matter being ingested into vital organs should ring health alarm bells. We might not like wearing seat belts, but we are fully aware of the benefits. 

Other Ways You Can HelpYou may be unable to contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:
You, like me, might not smoke. Like me you may be concerned about friends and family who do. Like me, you may not like to see the harm that can befall these people and you feel that you NEED to do something to help.  Direct them to our pipes .
Like me, you may be worried about the harm caused by discarded butts to birds, fish and other wildlife - direct your smoking friends to Savorette

You may also dislike the thought of yourself, or others inhaling side stream smoke (Second hand smoke) - encourage your associates to visit Savorette

Spread the word that there is a better way to smoke, a safer way to smoke and environmentally more aware way to smoke. 
STOP PRESS: We have some pipes that we have decided not to sell.  They are exactly the same as our current models, but were a lightweight model we felt were not quite good enough for general release. We will give these free to persons who are seriously disadvantaged.  A letter to tell us why you need one and what you can do to help us get our product into the market and we will seriously consider your request. And please remember to use the Indiegogo share tools.

story: My Granddaughter is Hailey Satterwhite. She was diagnosed with severe Aplastic Anemia in February of this year. She has spent a week in the Childrens Hospital in Omaha twice so far. In July she will be having a bone marrow transplant and her younger brother Connor is the donor. Hailey is 4 and Connor is about 18 monthes. She will be in the Hospital for 100 days after the surgery. This doesn't include the time before surgery when she will have to endure Chemo. Since February her parents have had to take her from Carroll Iowa to Omaha at least once a week to receive platelets or plasma or both. Her parents are both hard working people but all the time they need to take off is sappng their resources. Any money raised will go towards Haileys expenses and the expenses incurred for traveling and living expenses while Hailey is in the hospital.

story:
Short Summary

Tennis Power Trainer, LLC is a start-up company located in Lomita, California.  Our company is focused on the development, manufacture and distribution of what we believe to be a particularly beneficial tennis training device.  We call it the Swing Max.  In addition, we have two other resistance training products - the Swing Sleeve and Swing Band.
The founders of the company have extensive experience in the sport at all levels and have worked with top-ranked junior and  professional players throughout their respective careers.  We have the support and endorsement of some of the most visible personalities in tennis.  
Our goal was to provide a device for tennis players to engage in resistance training while actually hitting a "live" ball. What this means is that the player is able to develop their swing strength while actually performing all the various shots used in playing the sport. Because the resistance is occurring during actual play, the user is also developing better racquet control and maximizing their muscle-memory leading to a more consistent and natural skill set.
We call our product the Swing Max.  It can be quickly installed on virtually any player racquet and used for warmups, feeding drills and while hitting with other players.
The Swing Max can be used for both on-court and off-court training.  When not in use it can be stored in the player's racquet bag.

To date, we have designed, produced and tested several prototypes. We have sought the advise and feedback of both players and coaches in recreational, junior and professional settings.

We have applied for a US patent which is pending approval with the USPTO.

We have obtained the domain name TennisPowerTrainer.com and are building what we believe will be a stunning website - complete with an online store, a blog covering the sport of tennis and a series of instructional and training videos.

We have accomplished much in a very short period and are committed to deliver and promote a quality product to the tennis community in the United States and worldwide.

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking funding support to facilitate our first production run and to develop high-quality, attractive packaging and displays.

We are currently on-track to launch our products in early 2016.

Because we are making steady progress toward our goal, we elected to use crowd-funding as a pre-sales vehicle to allow early access to our product line.

While many of our perks are our actual products, we have also created Tennis Power Trainer gear for those of you who do not play tennis, but still want to help us achieve our goals.

T-Shirts will be available for both men and women and will vary in size and color.  Coffee mugs will be of a similar style as those depicted.

The following image is made from our prototypes.  The actual rewards will be made from our first production run and will have our multi-color Tennis Power Trainer logos printed on each product.

Even if we do not reach our funding goal, we will still be able to derive benefit from this campaign in the form of pre-sales and developing brand recognition.  We are prepared to fulfill our commitments regardless of the success of the campaign.  All funds raised will help to offset our developmental costs.

The Impact

Tennis is a global sport.  It is played by people of all ages and abilities.  It is fun, social and character building.

Tennis players enjoy developing their game - regardless of their skill level.  We have tools to help players improve their game and to allow them to enjoy the sport even more.

At the highest levels of the sport, our equipment is attractive to high-performance junior players and to professional players.  In the competitive world of tennis, our resistance products provide the serious player with a new level of training opportunities.

Our products also provide benefits in the form of both injury prevention and injury recovery.  We are working with a leading authority in the area of physiotherapy to develop specific exercises and demonstration videos using our products for these applications.

Risks & Challenges

There are many products on the market that promise to improve a player's abilities in tennis. Some are beneficial, some are not. We believe we have a good understanding of the community that is our market (players and coaches) and do not underestimate their sophistication and "prove it" approach to new concepts and training aids.

Because we have conducted extensive product testing with players of all levels, from beginners to top-ranked professionals, we are very confident the Swing Max is something players and coaches have been looking for and will use throughout their careers.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand not everyone can contribute financially.  If you believe in what we're doing and share our vision, we ask that you spread the word using the Indiegogo share tools.

story:
The National Institute on Drug Abuse recommends a treatment program that begins with medical detoxification followed by behavioral therapy and relapse prevention, but there’s a real void in the recovery industry around long term relapse support and we believe that Ekka can help change that through its total wellness system designed by our in house Naturopathic Doctor, Holistic Health Practitioner, yoga and fitness experts.

                                           

                                 How does Ekka Recovery Support the body?

  • Replenishes lost essential digestive enzymes and minerals alleviating symptoms of bloating, constipation, or IBS.
  • Shifts dietary patterns associated with addiction reducing physical cravings.
  • Detoxes the body enhancing energy and mood.
  • Strengthens and calms the nervous system improving sleep and reducing anxiety

How can we help?

We believe that through creating new rituals and new routines individuals in recovery will become stronger versions of themselves. Our product is a monthly subscription box, custom tailored by our in house Naturopathic Doctor and Holistic Health Practitioner with 4-5 of the highest quality supplements, superfoods and other items to support recovery.  In addition we offer:

  • text message reminders,
  • workouts,
  • nutritional recipes
  • meditation and yoga for sleep and anxiety 
  • supportive online community space

Addiction doesn't just affect the person going through recovery, but their children, family and the people around them that care. We believe that our product has the potential to create a HUGE impact in our communities  because  whose life hasn't been touched by addiction in one way or another?

Each month has a different theme and each month Ekka members receive:

  • One box delivered to your door with a 4 - 5 superfoods, supplements and other fun and nourishing items to support a healthy lifestyle in recovery and  make your skin and body glow from the inside out!
  • One themed yoga video to give you grace and serenity in life and long lean muscles.
  • One themed meditation to help you handle mental and emotional triggers and find calm in yourself.
  • One video fitness sequence to bring you to new levels of strength and endurance in your body.
  • One downloadable easy to make recipe so you always have something quick and nourishing to eat or drink.
  • Access to the Ekka Community Group on Facebook so you’ll always have a community to share the triumphs and challenges of life with.
  • One special topic webinar giving you access to deeper knowledge on topics that you care about.

Examples of what you might find in a box* and HOW they help

Chlorella aids in detoxing the body of heavy metals. It is also alkalizing, hydrating and assists in the growth of healthy gut flora.

  • Why this helps:  Alcohol and poor diet depletes the body of healthy gut flora which can cause symptoms of indigestion, constipation, diarrhea, gas, bloating and discomfort. Chlorella aids in reversing these symptoms by restoring the alkalinity in the body and assisting in the growth of gut flora.

 Chocolate not only connotes sweet reward but also contains anandamide, a molecule which locks into receptor sites in the brain known to increase feelings of bliss and relaxation.

  • Why this helps: Anandamide stimulates the same receptor sites as opiates do. By replacing an addiction with a healthy new food ritual, individuals in recovery can reward themselves with something sweet and experience feelings of bliss.  

 Reishi has been used for centuries in Chinese medicine to calm the nervous system and reduce anxiety and stress.  

  • Why this helps: Part of recovery is restoring balance to the nervous system. Neurological imbalances can be responsible for erratic behavior, emotional instability and anxiety. Reishi not only has potent immunological properties but works to tone and stabilize the nervous system.

*We work closely with our wholesale partners and team to ensure only the highest quality products make their way into our boxes. 

                          What people are saying

 

                                               

"Recovery, for me, has to be holistic. I want it to enhance my life. My sobriety is more than living without alcohol and drugs; it is about living a life of balance and ultimately a sense of alchemy. It is about striving to achieve health and wellness in my whole self.  I want to feel energised and to enjoy life with a spring in my step. I believe that the supportive tools that Ekka have come up with could help those in recovery do just that. It can help educate people on the power that healthy and nutritious foods can harness and highlight how that might bring gifts to those in recovery. It will educate on the power of exercise and healthy choice. It will bring about a movement that I believe the recovery community needs: one of health and wellness and a holistic approach to recovery. And that would be truly magical." - Olivia Pennelle w/ Liv's Recovery Kitchen 

                                                      

"I feel that big part of my recovery was getting my body back into shape, not just physically, but taking care of the whole internal system. Eating healthy and exercising was crucial to my recovery, during treatment I took supplements that the center advised and they made me feel great, once I got out I was lost and didn't know which supplements to buy nor did I have the time to buy them. I believe that Ekka's monthly subscription box will help guide individuals like myself in recovery to help them in the right direction, without worrying about where and what we should take or whether we need to order more, it is the convenience that made me became a member!  I think Ekka can help people in recovery to be happier and healthier individuals!" -Damien Ross founder of Pocket Rehab (Recovery assistance app, "Connect with peers anonymously 24/7")

                                                    

"Superfoods have been a huge part of my recovery. I did a lot of damage to my body over my years in my eating disorder and addiction and superfoods have helped heal my body. I also think that creating my food with intentionality about the nutrition if offers me is a wonderful form of self-care." Nicky England founder of Lotus Recovery

  Ekka Mission

Our mission is to alleviate the physical and social discomfort of recovery and lower the chance of relapse through carefully curated recovery boxes filled with superfoods, supplements, and other nourishing items.​

         Where your contributions will be spent?

Our funding goal is $20,173.00 which is the minimum we need to get our start up expenses covered and product out the door.  This is an ALL or NOTHING campaign meaning, if we don't hit our target we collect ZERO dollars! 

Boxes/Packaging/ Print Plate:   $7,610                                                                

Consultant Costs:                            $2,250

Legal Fees:                                          $2,000

Marketing/ Design                           $3,353

Indigogo fees/ CC processing        20%

Total:                                                  $20,173

                    

                        Who created Ekka Recovery?

After watching friends and family struggle with addiction and relapse Nuria and Yvette decided to take their personal interest and years of cumulative experience in health and wellness and create a box for the recovery community that incorporated diet, lifestyle and support as relapse prevention. It is their belief that no matter what the “addiction” is that someone is suffering from, everyone can benefit from a balanced life which includes superfoods, supplements, exercise and support through community.

Nuria is a certified yoga instructor with over a decade in meditation and yoga experience with a focus on recovery, PTSD and the mind/body connection. Yvette is a fitness expert and has spent over ten years focusing on fitness and wellness with the attitude that exercise, in order to be effective, needs to be fun. Their combined passion for wholeness and support in all aspects of life is a foundation of Ekka Recovery.

                         Who are the experts?

                                                     

Naturopathic Doctor: Venessa Madrigal

Venessa leads holistic health at Ekka Recovery. She holds a Doctorate in Naturopathic Medicine from the National College of Natural Medicine in Portland, Oregon, in addition to a BS in Kinesiology and several other trainings and certifications. Venessa’s passion for holistic wellbeing is a cornerstone of Ekka. Drawing from her years of experience in fitness and healthcare Venessa’s philosophy focuses on health as a culmination of physical, emotional, and spiritual well being. Venessa practices as a primary care provider in Oregon and Washington and as a specialist in California with special interests in mental health, addiction and recovery, LGBQT health, and migrant and global health. Seeing how we as a collective all suffer from addictions, Venessa has made it her life’s work to assist others in their journey of well being.

                                      

Nutritionist: Sasha Gibson

Sasha Gibson leads nutrition at Ekka Recovery. As a holistic health practitioner with a certification from the Institute of Integrative Nutrition and decades of experience in nutrition, health and wellness Sasha’s passion for balance is a foundation of Ekka Recovery. Her philosophy centers on getting members on the right program for their body, their habits and their likes and dislikes and adding items to their routines, instead of removing them, to balance the body as a whole. The mission of Ekka Recovery is a matter close to her as she has seen nearly every loved one in her life struggle with addiction in some form. Sasha truly sees the connection between diet and recovery and strives to make these life changing tools easy and accessible for all.

     We know we can’t do this alone!

If this inspires you or may help someone you know please join the campaign and/ or share the Ekka movement so others can know about this life changing product.  

            Let's work together to keep our loved ones and community healthy!

She holds a Doctorate in Naturopathic Medicine from the National College of Natural Medicine in Portland, Oregon, in addition to a BS in Kinesiology and several other trainings and certifications. Venessa’s passion for holistic wellbeing is a cornerstone of Ekka. Drawing from her years of experience in fitness and healthcare Venessa’s philosophy focuses on health as a culmination of physical, emotional, and spiritual well being. Venessa practices as a primary care provider in Oregon and Washington and as a specialist in California with special interests in mental health, addiction and recovery, LGBQT health, and migrant and global health. Seeing how we as a collective all suffer from addictions, Venessa has made it her life’s work to assist others in their journey of well being.                                      Nutritionist: Sasha Gibson Sasha Gibson leads nutrition at Ekka Recovery. As a holistic health practitioner with a certification from the Institute of Integrative Nutrition and decades of experience in nutrition, health and wellness Sasha’s passion for balance is a foundation of Ekka Recovery. Her philosophy centers on getting members on the right program for their body, their habits and their likes and dislikes and adding items to their routines, instead of removing them, to balance the body as a whole. The mission of Ekka Recovery is a matter close to her as she has seen nearly every loved one in her life struggle with addiction in some form. Sasha truly sees the connection between diet and recovery and strives to make these life changing tools easy and accessible for all.     We know we can’t do this alone! 
If this inspires you or may help someone you know please join the campaign and/ or share the Ekka movement so others can know about this life changing product.              Let's work together to keep our loved ones and community healthy!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Iuliia Rudenko-Golden. I was born and raised in Mariupol, a beautiful town in the south of Ukraine.  I moved to New York City a little over 4 years ago. During my journey I deeply fell in love with a practice that I was already very familiar with. The spiritual and body practice of Yoga. During the past few years I have really excelled in perfecting my passion at premier schools such as Jivamukti and Laughing Lotus. I believe now is the time to take my practice to the next level and accumulate my 200 hour teacher training certificate where Yoga originated. India. Mysore, Karnataka to be exact, where I will be training under the Ashtanga Yoga School from February to March 2016. Most of the money has come out of my pocket, but there is still expenses I have yet to pay for because of Cost. 

What We Need & What You Get

*Traveling expenses $1,500 (Include airline tickets, Trains, and busses.)

* 200 Hr Teacher training program $1,400 (which include living accommodations, food, and training course.)

* Traveling Visa $135.

The Impact

This is really going to help me create a strong foundation for my own style of Yoga. With this certificate I can finally teach and spread my knowledge and love for yoga with others.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't  donate please contribute by sharing with your friends and family.

story:
We are trying to raise funds to hold a memorial service for my mother

Cynthia Lynn who played "Helga"

on the hit show "Hogans Heroes"

My wonderful and beautiful mother passed away 3/10/2014 

suddenly of multiple organ failure in Panorama City, Ca.

She was 76 years old.

She did not have any money and I KNOW that she wanted to have a

CELEBRATION of life for her family and fans. 

She wanted to be sure that people celebrated with champagne and 

remembered all the great times and to not be sad upon her death.

Of course this is not the case for me as I was extremely close to my

mother and this is the hardest thing I have ever had to endure.

I know that heaven has gained an angel but I still wish she was here with me.

But I want to follow through with her wishes and do the best I can to give her

an awesome memorial service with tons of beautiful flowers and pictures of 

her everywhere for her fans to take home to remember her.

What We Need & What You Get

The money you graciously donate will go towards flowers, blow up posters of my favorite photos plus photos of my mother that people attending can take home with them to remember my mother.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are unable to contribute money you can still help by spreading the word and posting this on your facebook page or website. You can also order a gift basket or flowers for someone you love for a birthday or any other occasion because I am an affiliate of a national gift basket and flower company. All orders that come in is also additional income that will help me with what I need to do.

Here is the link to the site: http://www.corporateeventchannel.com/gift-baske...  You can visit my FB page at http://www.facebook.com/lisa.brando.5

Thank you so very, very much - In love

Lisa Brando XOXO :)
Cynthia Lynn's Daughter

story:
My name is Ian Rubijono-Bond.  I’m building a martial arts school and I need your help.

In the summer of 2015 many of you helped fund my campaign to participate in an advanced training seminar run by the School of Oom Yung Doe. At that time, I was a teaching intern in the school and committed to a rigorous personal practice. I was also studying full time at Lesley University with a major in counseling and a minor in holistic psychology. Now in 2016, I’ve completed my undergraduate degree, I’ve earned my first-degree black belt, and have been granted the position of Assistant Instructor. Yay! I have exceeded my goals with the love and support of those in my life. Without it, I would not have been exposed to such amazing training and would likely not be where I am today. Now it is time reach further so I can give back.

This summer, I have the opportunity to open my own Oom Yung Doe school. It is such a great honor; I am so grateful to have this opportunity and for the support from my teachers, but I also need your support.

With seed funding from you and the Oom Yung Doe Regional Team, I will be overseeing daily operations at the new Lexington location. This includes daily classes, satellite programs in the area, as well as private lessons. Once funded, I will be able to share what I love with my community. 

Oom Yung Doe teaches eight martial arts as one: Bagwa, Tai chi, Kung Fu, Aikido, Judo, Samurai, Kong Su (Tai Kwon Do), and 18 weapons. While I was in school, and now as a postgraduate with a degree in holistic and mental health, I have found nothing better to fully address and develop the human condition. This is a 1500-year-old system of martial arts, taught by patient and compassionate teachers, which has proven to be the best way to build strength, peace, confidence, and greatly improve mental and physical health. My teachers have done all of this for me and I will help you achieve your goals of health and happiness as well.

The great thing about opening a martial arts school: all you need is a roof and open space! My goal of $10,000 USD will cover build out, supplies, and operating expenses for the first few months! But this campaign isn't only about my needs; I really feel it is about you and helping each other create a supportive community.

To see some of the perks of donating, see the list below!

· If you are drawn to self-improvement both mentally and physically, as I was, a contribution of $245 will serve as your first month’s membership fee. Selecting this perk means that until the physical location is open, you will be eligible for a private lesson and follow up session. Once the physical location is open, you will be a registered student for that first month and will have the opportunity to really learn what Oom Yung Doe is and have the joy of experiencing it for yourself. You will receive your uniform, and a specially formulated herbal spray that greatly improves muscle and joint warm up and recovery times. As the first month comes to a close, you decide if you want to continue your membership.

· A contribution of $130 makes you eligible for a private lesson with me. In this session, we will discuss your fitness and mental health goals, and then work on them one-on-one for an hour. Whatever you may be interested in: Breathing techniques, meditation, self-defense, core strength, you will be given a regiment to practice on your own. We will also have a follow up session to check on your progress.

In the 2015 campaign, I was able to raise $1000 over my goal! The success of that campaign helped me afford advanced training to better my understanding of the art. My goal with this 2016 campaign is to give back to my community by creating a safe space for those who want to better themselves and by sharing what I’ve learned. By helping you and your loved ones better your health, increase your sense of peace, confidence and build a strong sense of community – I aim to make a healthier, more peaceful, more inclusive world; one person at a time.

Of course there are risks involved in opening any business. There is the possibility of low student sign up rates. The main source of revenue is student membership. But the best part of being a teacher in this community is having the support from the regional and master level teaching teams. The members of these teams have a combined 100+ years of experience in teaching and daily school operations. If there is a time where I need assistance with teaching, or have a question about students or anything regarding the operation of a school, I am only a phone call away from my teachers and fellow instructors. The master level instructors regularly visit the schools throughout the year. 

Because it is a martial arts school, there is always some chance of injury. However, through the system taught at Oom Yung Doe schools, injuries are almost nonexistent. Other than the occasional strain or pulled muscle from students pushing themselves too hard, our self defense is practiced and monitored for safety, but is highly effective when applied fully. 

Even if signing up does not interest you or you are unable to contribute, spread the word! Helping you and anyone else to improve their quality of life is what I want to do with my time on earth, and I thank you so much for your help. Be well.

story:
Baby Elijah

We are a Marietta, Ga based 501(c)(3) serving orphans in Kenya. This little guy, Elijah, came to our Infant Rescue home in Mid-February. He was 21 days old and weighed 4 pounds. When we were contacted about Elijah, we knew he had one leg that was unhealthy. We soon learned his left leg had become infected with gangrene due an unsterile IV administered into his foot when he was born. We also learned he has congenital hydrocephalus and a potential heart condition. He was named Elijah Hodari which means strong or brave in Swahili.

Our missionary drove 5 hours to the nearest mission hospital and admitted little Elijah. Elijah was given IV fluids for 2 weeks to strengthen him for the upcoming procedures. His left leg was amputated 2 weeks ago, and he came back to our rescue home for a short recovery. 

The next phase is to address the hydrocephalus. We began researching options and found a hospital in Uganda performing a state of the art shunt-less procedure. We began the process of contacting the neurosurgeon in Uganda and rejoiced last week when we learned they would review Elijah's case. 

This morning, Kenyan time, our missionary, a staff member and little Elijah began the trip to CURE Hospital in Mbale, Uganda. A four hour drive, an hour airplane ride, and another 5 hours later they arrived at the hospital. We are praying he will see a doctor soon and scheduled for the ETV-CPC surgery. 

How you can help

We are raising $10,000 USD. This will cover to cover the travel expenses, surgery cost, hospital stay, recovery therapy and healthcare as well as follow up visits every 2-3 months for the next year.   

The Impact

We know God called us to respond to the needs of Elijah. He is such a brave little guy and has already endured so much in his short life thus far. Your help in raising this money will greatly impact Elijah's life.

story:
Neck pain is a common problem with few solutions. But thanks to The Neck Hammock, that’s about to change. The Neck Hammock brings the miracle of cervical traction to your home in the form of a simple, portable device you can use every day.

It helps release muscle tension in as little as 10 minutes a day and for less than the cost of a single physical therapy session.

 

 

 

If you have frequent neck pain or know someone who does, you know it’s not an easy problem to get rid of. Medications simply dull the pain but do not eliminate it. And visits to your physical therapist are costly and time-consuming. Other products have tried to bring neck pain relief home through cervical traction (a light stretching of the neck) but these devices are bulky, hard to operate and often ineffective.

Neck Hammock is the first affordable cervical traction device that does all the hard work for you. All you have to do is lie back and relax.

 

 

The Neck Hammock helps the muscles relax and gradually stretch.

This allows for the intervertebral space to expand and allow better blood flow and circulation.

Better circulation helps to oxygenate muscles, nerves, tendons, and ligaments which leads to decreased pain and increased mobility.

It’s hard to believe that one device could relieve tension headaches, release pinched nerves, reduce herniated discs and relieve overall pressure and yet, that’s exactly what The Neck Hammock does.

 

 

 

 

 

Feel your muscles opening up and your neck pain slipping away for good!

 

 

 

Cervical traction is the process of relaxing and stretching the neck muscles to increase blood flow and circulation. But the problem with most cervical traction devices is that it’s hard to use them consistently.

Neck Hammock makes it easy to treat neck pain consistently, which is the key to curing it. Because it’s portable and only takes 10 minutes to be effective, Neck Hammock is the only cervical traction solution you can (and will want to) use every day.

Neck Hammock was created by a licensed physical therapist who saw the need for a product his patients could easily use at home.

Because Neck Hammock is backed by science, you can feel comfortable using it just as the doctor ordered.It’s like having a physical therapist with you all the time.

Unlike other devices out there, Neck Hammock is small and portable, so you can take it anywhere with you.

All you have to do is find a good place to chill, no matter where you are.

 

The problem with many cervical traction treatments is that they cost a lot of time and money. Neck Hammock just requires 10 minutes of your time, and it costs less than the amount of a single physical therapy session.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Get The Daily Stretch eBook FOR FREE when you share on Facebook!

Developed by a Licensed Physical Therapist, Athletic Trainer, and Level 2 Fascial Stretch Therapist, we have created a simple and easy to use book on how to: improve your overall flexibility, mobility, and energy levels! Based on our combined clinical expertise, we have put together our favorite stretches that yield the HIGHEST bang for your buck to get you moving healthier and happier. The best part is: You only have to perform a single stretch a day! You don't have to wonder or research what stretches you should be doing because we already did that, and we put them together into an ebook JUST for YOU!
